merch.name: Canvas tote bag
merch.description: Lightweight tote bag with inner pockets. Made from 100% recycled canvas. One size only (12"), available in various prints.

merch.name: Coffee tumbler
merch.description: Perfectly sized 16oz coffee tumbler for when you're on the go. Insulated stainless steel with removable lid.

merch.name: Mug
merch.description: Terracotta mug to keep your cup of java piping hot. Handcrafted in Turkey. Available in different sizes and colors.

merch.name: Gift basket
merch.description: The perfect gift for your favorite coffee lover. Includes one bag of our premium roasted beans.

merch.name: Coasters
merch.description: Set of six 10 cm absorbant drink coasters to hold your favorite beverage (like our coffee).

merch.name: Drip coffee jug
merch.description: Pour over coffee maker with a reusable stainless steel coffee filter. Perfect for home, travel or outdoor.
